item.title: In Praise of Resource Scoping
item.description: When assessing your environment, problem or your goal, meticulously scout the tools at your disposal. When you're learning a new job, a new project or a programming language's tools for example, it pays to have a grasp of your options. Researching what documentation, guides, tools or libraries are at your â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
